text: 78 years ago, thousands of brave Americans and our Allies stormed Nazi-occupied Normandy as part of the largest air, land, and sea invasion in history. We will never forget their bravery and sacrifices that led to the liberation of Europe from Nazis. #DDay https://t.co/dvpzMjuzFM

Great meeting with a constituent who works in a health department on the importance of access to telehealth and diabetes services. As I work on health care policy in @housecommerce, it's important to hear from constituents on their ideas to keep Americans healthy. https://t.co/515ZYoRAPu

#ICYMI Co-chairs @VernBuchanan & I announced proposals for @gopleaders’ Healthy Future Task Force to expand access to innovative health care technologies and crack down on fraud to save taxpayer dollars. I commend @RepMMM, @RepMGriffith & @MikeKellyPA for their great work.

On @HouseCommerce, I’m focused on solutions to expand broadband access for Kentuckians. I've supported funding for broadband expansion, improvements to broadband mapping, & resources to protect small and rural providers from the influence of bad actors, such as CCP-backed Huawei.

At a congressional hearing last week on strengthening our communications networks, my SMART Spectrum Act was discussed as a way to efficiently make federal spectrum more available for commercial use and expand 5G.
Happy birthday, Kentucky! On this day 230 years ago, our Commonwealth was admitted to the Union as the 15th state. I’m proud to call Kentucky home and to represent the people of the 2nd district.

I recently had the opportunity to tour @jctcjessamine and learned about the educational opportunities available for students. As co-chair of the Congressional Apprenticeship Caucus, I support a wide variety of education pathways for students to advance their careers. https://t.co/0MGyQXb0EF
